translated: He sees the Tathāgata, the entire host of Bodhisattvas, and the deities of the maṇḍala of the knowledge mantra, together with their ornaments and the maṇḍala that has been imagined, and the vast celestial mansion.

analyzed: mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do //

translated: Sitting in front, it gives, and this previously accumulated obscuration, and all evil is completely exhausted, and all roots of virtue are completely perfected, and one's own depression, and.

translated: Having enchanted the syllable ghaṇ with the mantra one thousand and eight times, one should apply it as a bindu to all the orifices.

original: bu ga'i sgo thams cad bye ste sgor gnas par byed do //
analyzed: bu ga'i sgo thams cad bye ste sgor gnas par byed do //

analyzed: gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par byed do; ;gi ham gis snying gar thig le byas nas gang du 'jug par byed pa de dang de nyid du mchod pa chen por 'gyur te /

original: nor che ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba thob bo //
analyzed: nor che ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba thob bo //

original: lag pa gnyis la byugs pas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur te /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis la byugs pas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur te /

original: gang blangs pa de thams cad so sor rnyed do //
analyzed: gang blangs pa de thams cad so sor rnyed do //
translated: Whatever one takes, one will obtain it all.

original: rgyal po dbang du byed par 'dod pas lag pa g-yas pa la gi ham gis byugs nas lan stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te rgyal po'i sgo la thal lcag sbyin par bya ste /

analyzed: rgyal po dang brtsun mo sras dang 'khro dang bcas pa bdag nyid dang / nor gyis kyang dbang du 'gyur ro //

original: bud med dbang du byed pa la me tog dang 'bras bu la lan stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya /
analyzed: bud med dbang du byed pa la me tog dang 'bras bu la lan stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya /

original: yang na mngag par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na mngag par bya ste /

original: 'phral nyid du dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phral nyid du dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //

original: gang du 'dod pa de dang de nyid du 'gro'o //
analyzed: gang du 'dod pa de dang de nyid du 'gro'o //

original: slar yang 'ong ngo //
analyzed: slar yang 'ong ngo //

analyzed: yang na ming smos pas nam mkha' la 'phang bar bya ste /
translated: Or, by mentioning her name, one should throw the flowers into the sky.

original: gang gi ming @305b smos pa de 'gugs par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gi ming @305b smos pa de 'gugs par 'gyur zhing /

original: mtshan mo 'ong bar byed do //
analyzed: mtshan mo 'ong bar byed do //

original: mthu stobs kyis slar yang phyir ldog ste 'gro'o //
analyzed: mthu stobs kyis slar yang phyir ldog ste 'gro'o //
translated: By the power of the mantra, he will return again.

analyzed: skyes pa dbang du byed pa la dz'a ti dang / sna ma'i me tog la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o //

original: yang na mngag par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na mngag par bya ste /
translated: Or one should send him on an errand.

original: mngag par bya ste /
analyzed: mngag par bya ste /
translated: Or one should send her on an errand.

original: bzung ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzung ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely touching her, one will enthrall her.

original: grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing /

original: ji srid 'tsho bar nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid 'tsho bar nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rje rigs dbang du byed pa la ba sha ka'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste /
translated: For subjugating the kṣatriyas, one should offer a flower of the bāṣpika, having enchanted it one hundred and eight times.

original: dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so //
translated: Having become subjugated, they will remain close by.

original: bram ze dbang du byed pas zho dang 'o ma'i bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: bram ze dbang du byed pas zho dang 'o ma'i bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste /

original: bram ze dbang du byed par grub bo //
analyzed: bram ze dbang du byed par grub bo //
translated: It is accomplished for subjugating the brahmins.

original: rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la bu ram dang 'o ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la bu ram dang 'o ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste /

original: dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang du 'gyur ro //

original: dmangs rigs dbang du byed rpa la gang dang gang gi bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: dmangs rigs dbang du byed rpa la gang dang gang gi bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste /
translated: For subjugating the vaiśyas, one should offer whatever food one has, having enchanted it one hundred and eight times.

original: zos pa tsam gyi @306a *//
analyzed: zos pa tsam gyi @306a *//
translated: As soon as they eat it,

original: mod la dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mod la dbang du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa'i bya ba gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa bya ba rnams ni /

analyzed: de nas don yod pa'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gzugs kyi yo byad dang / cho gar 'gyur te /

translated: By reciting this dhāraṇī of the king of knowledge ten thousand times, one will be consecrated with the secret mudrā of all tathāgatas of the three times.

analyzed: rig sngags 'chang des kyang dang por rmi lam gyi nang du mthong ngo //

translated: All the Blessed Buddhas of the three times confer the consecration of the seal of the wish-fulfilling gem of Vairocana, and they consecrate him.

original: gang du 'dod pa der 'jug go //
analyzed: gang du 'dod pa der 'jug go //

analyzed: rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor rnams ston par @307a *//

analyzed: mdzad do // rig sngags 'chang rang nyid la yang mngon par dbang bskur par byed do //

analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed do //

original: yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: stong phrag gsum pa bzlas pas rmi lam chen po gsum pa bstan pa mthong ste /
translated: By reciting three thousand times, one will see the three great dreams.

translated: All those tathāgatas of the three times will also empower the vidyādhara with the secret pledge of the jewel family, with the mudrā, with the maṇḍala, and with the actual empowerment.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par mdzad do //

analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dngos grub kyi dam tshig gi dbang bskur ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //

analyzed: legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed cing rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang ji srid sangs rgyas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob par yang dag par dgongs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And those tathāgatas will be intent on blessing the magical emanations of all the tathāgatas until they become buddhas.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be empowered by the great seal of the wish-fulfilling jewel family.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: They will become the supreme secret essence of the wish-fulfilling jewel family of all the tathāgatas.

original: bzlas pa lnga pas rmi lam chen po'i phyag rgya ston par byed pa ni /
analyzed: bzlas pa lnga pas rmi lam chen po'i phyag rgya ston par byed pa ni /
translated: The great seal of dreams is taught by the five recitations.

analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag rdzogs par phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas kyi mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mthong ngo //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang phyir mi ldog pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen por mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
translated: All the tathāgatas also consecrate him with the great consecration of the great maṇḍala of non-returning.

analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad @308b dang / phyag rgya chen po mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He is consecrated with all the maṇḍalas and the great seal.

original: bzlas pa drug bas rmi lam yang dag par ston pa ni /
analyzed: bzlas pa drug bas rmi lam yang dag par ston pa ni /
translated: “The six-syllable mantra reveals dreams:

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub kyi snying por gshegs te rdo rje'i gdan byin gyis rlob pas byin gyis brlabs te mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All the tathāgatas come to the site of enlightenment and consecrate him with the consecration of the vajra seat.

analyzed: dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa mthong ste seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang rang rang gi rig sngags 'chang phyir mi ldog par mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
translated: Those tathāgatas will confer the irreversible consecration of the vidyādhara upon each one.

original: legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung rjod par mdzad do //
analyzed: legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung rjod par mdzad do //
translated: They will utter the words “Excellent! Excellent!”

original: dgongs pa cher brtan pas dgongs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgongs pa cher brtan pas dgongs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be pleased by the firm resolve.

original: ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All the tathāgatas will follow them until they reach the enlightenment of buddhahood.

original: bzlas pa bdun pas rmi lam chen po ston te /
analyzed: bzlas pa bdun pas rmi lam chen po ston te /
translated: The seventh recitation will show a great dream:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / chos kyi sgron me sbor ba dang / chos kyi rgyan mtshan sgreng ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / chos kyi sgron me sbor ba dang / chos kyi rgyan mtshan sgreng ba dang /
translated: the tathāgatas attaining complete buddhahood, turning the wheel of the Dharma, subduing Māra, bringing down the rain of the sacred Dharma, lighting the lamp of the Dharma, raising the banner of the Dharma,

analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi dung 'bud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ba mthong ngo //
translated: He saw the conch of the holy Dharma being blown, and all the Tathāgatas bestowing the great seal consecration.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo @309a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo @309a *//
translated: Those Tathāgatas also bestowed the consecration of the great seal, the turning of the wheel of the Dharma,

original: bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / phyag rgyas dbang bskur bas mngon par bskur par mdzad do //
analyzed: bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / phyag rgyas dbang bskur bas mngon par bskur par mdzad do //
translated: the subjugation of Māra, and the consecration of the seal.

original: legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par mdzad do //
analyzed: legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par mdzad do //
translated: They uttered the sound “Excellent, excellent!”

original: phyag rgya chen po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / kun nas gsang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub dang / mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / kun nas gsang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub dang / mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
translated: They bestowed the great seal, the maṇḍala, the complete secret, the maṇḍala of liberation, the accomplishment of reality, and the consecration.

original: de bzhin du bklags pa dang / bzlas pa tsam gyis cho ga dang / las kyi 'bras bu ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du bklags pa dang / bzlas pa tsam gyis cho ga dang / las kyi 'bras bu ston par mdzad do //
translated: In the same way, by merely reciting and repeating [the mantra], they showed the result of the rite and activity.

original: don yod pa'i nor bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho ga 'di yang rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don yod pa'i nor bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho ga 'di yang rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: This dhāraṇī of the great seal of Vairocana, the Amoghasiddhi jewel, will also be practiced.

original: 'di bklags pa dang dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di bklags pa dang dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely reading and remembering this, one will enter the great maṇḍala of Vairocana, all tathāgatas.

original: thams cad du gnas la gnas pa'i dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du gnas la gnas pa'i dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will know the commitments that abide everywhere.

original: bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mtshan nas smos nas mngon sum du ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mtshan nas smos nas mngon sum du ston par mdzad do //
translated: At the very moment of recitation, all tathāgatas of the three times will proclaim one's name and appear in person.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will manifest as the tathāgata Vairocana.

original: mtshan smos nas 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan smos nas 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will proclaim one's name.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: All tathāgatas will hold the seal of Vairocana.

original: de bzhin gshegs @309b thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs @309b thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: He will become the supreme secret of all the Tathāgatas.

original: sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa rnam par 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa rnam par 'joms par byed do //
translated: He will destroy all evil, obscurations, and wickedness, and the evil and obscurations of the five inexpiable acts and so forth.

analyzed: bklags pa tsam dang / lan gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis de thams cad yongs su zad pa dang / yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely reciting it once, all of that will be exhausted and eliminated.

original: sems can gyi sdig pa'i chos gang cung zad kun tu spyad pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i sems can de'i mdun du lan gsum du dbyangs gsang bstod pas brjod cing dran par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi sdig pa'i chos gang cung zad kun tu spyad pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i sems can de'i mdun du lan gsum du dbyangs gsang bstod pas brjod cing dran par bya ste /
translated: If any sentient being has engaged in evil and inexpiable acts, and is headed for the Avīci hell, they should recite this three times in front of them, with a melodious and exalted voice.

original: de'i sgra thos pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med par song ba thams cad dang / mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i sgra thos pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med par song ba thams cad dang / mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: The mere hearing of this sound will purify all negative actions, obscurations, and the most heinous acts, and will bring supreme benefit to those in the Avīci hell.

original: sems can de yang sdig pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can de yang sdig pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //

original: yang na sdig pa can gyi sems can shi bar gyur pas bsod nams kyi don du bsod nams 'dod pas sems can de'i don du yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te sems can de'i don du ro bsregs pa'am /

translated: Alternatively, if a sinful being has died, for the sake of his merit, one who desires merit should recite the mantra over white mustard seeds twenty-one times and, for the sake of that being, burn the seeds as an offering.

original: mchod pa'am / sbas pa'am /🔽rus pa'i rkang rus sam /
analyzed: mchod pa'am / sbas pa'am / rus pa'i rkang rus sam /
translated: Or one should bury them,🔽or scatter them over the bones or the skeleton,

analyzed: dur khrod kyi dbus su de'i steng du gdab cing der gtor bar bya'o //
translated: or scatter them in the middle of the charnel ground.

original: gtor ba tsam gyi mod la @310a *//
analyzed: gtor ba tsam gyi mod la @310a *//
translated: As soon as they are scattered,

original: sems can de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de nyid du sems can de'i lus la byang chub chen po'i yan lag gi chu'i dri'i mchog bsgos par 'gyur ro //

translated: Wherever that being is born, in that very place the water of the great limbs of enlightenment will be perfumed with the supreme fragrance of the body of that being.

original: 'phral nyid du dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dvags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi lus las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phral nyid du dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dvags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi lus las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Immediately, they will be freed from the bodies of hell beings, animals, pretas, the world of Yama, and asuras.

original: sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: All their misdeeds and obscurations will be completely exhausted.

original: der yang ngan 'gro rnams las 'phos par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: der yang ngan 'gro rnams las 'phos par 'gyur zhing /
translated: They will also be transferred from the lower realms.

analyzed: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be born in the realm of Sukhāvatī.

analyzed: 'di la so ma nyi dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not give rise to doubt or uncertainty about this.

original: gang gi tshe nad drag pos thebs par gyur pa de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis rnam par bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nad drag pos thebs par gyur pa de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis rnam par bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin par bya ste /

analyzed: de yang nad yun ring po las grol te rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be freed from the long-term illness and return to his own place.

original: nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be completely freed from all the sufferings of illness.

original: spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag rgyas btab ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag rgyas btab ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste /
translated: He should be sealed with the mudrā on the crown of his head and the mantra recited twenty-one times.

original: 'phral nyid du yongs su grol lo //
analyzed: 'phral nyid du yongs su grol lo //
translated: He will be completely freed immediately.

original: gal te nag po chen pos rang gi phyag rgyas btab na /
analyzed: gal te nag po chen pos rang gi phyag rgyas btab na /
translated: If Mahākāla has sealed him with his own mudrā,

analyzed: de ltar de nyid la bltas pas phyag rgya thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: by looking at him in that way, all the mudrās will be released.

original: gal te yun ring du ma grol na /
analyzed: gal te yun ring du ma grol na /
translated: If he is not freed for a long time,

analyzed: gang gis phyag rgyas btab par gyur pa de mig gnyis po dag 'byin @310b par 'gyur //

original: gdon gyis zin pa thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa la bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mdud ba nyi shu rtsa gcig byas la bcing bar bya ste /

original: gdon dang brjed byed thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gdon dang brjed byed thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //

original: nad thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: nad thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bcing bar bya ste /

original: nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo //

analyzed: mig sman dang mnyam par sbyar nas gdon gyis zin pa rnams kyi mig la bskus na /

analyzed: bskus pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad las yongs su grol lo //
translated: the moment it is applied, they will be completely freed from all spirits.

original: gal te yun ring por ma grol na /
analyzed: gal te yun ring por ma grol na /
translated: If they are not freed for a long time,

analyzed: gdon gyi mig gnyis 'byin par 'gyur ro //

original: rims nyin bzhi pa la mig gnyis la bsku bar bya'o //
analyzed: rims nyin bzhi pa la mig gnyis la bsku bar bya'o //

original: gal te yun ring du ma grol na /
analyzed: gal te yun ring du ma grol na /
translated: If he is not released after a long time,

analyzed: mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
translated: his head will split into seven pieces.

original: lus la me 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus la me 'bar bar 'gyur ro //

original: rims thams cad la bskus pa tsam gyis yongs su grol lo //
analyzed: rims thams cad la bskus pa tsam gyis yongs su grol lo //
translated: By merely anointing [oneself] with all fevers, one will be completely released.

original: gal te yun ring du mgrol na /
analyzed: gal te yun ring du mgrol na /
translated: If he is not released after a long time,

original: mgo bo dum bu bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mgo bo dum bu bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
translated: his head will split into seven pieces.

original: @311a *// dug gis zos pa'i mig la bsku bar bya zhing mngag gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: @311a *// dug gis zos pa'i mig la bsku bar bya zhing mngag gzhug par bya'o //
translated: One should anoint the eyes of one who has eaten poison, and he will be ordered [to live].

original: dug 'thungs pa la bskus na /
analyzed: dug 'thungs pa la bskus na /
translated: If one anoints one who has drunk poison,

original: dug med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dug med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the poison will be removed.

original: shi ba'i mig la bskus na /
analyzed: shi ba'i mig la bskus na /
translated: If one anoints the eyes of one who is dead,

original: ldang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ldang bar 'gyur te /
translated: he will rise up.

original: de smra bar byed do //
analyzed: de smra bar byed do //
translated: He will speak.

original: chu dang yungs kar brdegs na /
analyzed: chu dang yungs kar brdegs na /
translated: If one sprinkles him with water and mustard seeds,

original: slar yang 'gyel bar byed do //
analyzed: slar yang 'gyel bar byed do //
translated: he will fall down again.

original: mgo bo'i zug rdu dang / gzhogs phyed na ba rnams kyi mig la bsku ste /
analyzed: mgo bo'i zug rdu dang / gzhogs phyed na ba rnams kyi mig la bsku ste /
translated: One should anoint the eyes of one who has a headache or who has a paralyzed limb.

original: phyag rgya thams cad 'jig par byed do //
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad 'jig par byed do //
translated: All seals will be destroyed.

original: rgyal po khros pa gang gis skye bo gnas nas 'byin pa dang / de bzhin du mtshon cha mang po 'bab pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo nyid la yang 'dis bskus pa'i mig gis bltas na /
analyzed: rgyal po khros pa gang gis skye bo gnas nas 'byin pa dang / de bzhin du mtshon cha mang po 'bab pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo nyid la yang 'dis bskus pa'i mig gis bltas na /
translated: by whom, having anointed his eyes with this, he looks at them,

original: thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: all of them will be pleased.

original: de rnams thams cad rtag tu dbang du gyur nas gnas te 'di la the tshom mi bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad rtag tu dbang du gyur nas gnas te 'di la the tshom mi bya'o //
translated: All of them will always remain under his control. There is no doubt about this.

original: don yod pa'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so ////
analyzed: don yod pa'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so ////
translated: This is the essence of the consecration of the Amogha Mudra, and the means of accomplishment of the Dhāraṇī Ritual.

original: de nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po padma'i dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po padma'i dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad du 'gyur te /
translated: Then, the essence of the consecration of the Amogha Mahāmaṇḍala Lotus, the Dhāraṇī Jewel, will be the requisites.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rigs thun mong bar rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rigs thun mong bar rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will enter into the common family of the maṇḍala of all tathāgatas.

original: stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas mi pham pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor padma chen po'i dbang bskur ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i padma bcings pas spyi bor mngon par @311b dbang bskur bar 'gyur to //
analyzed: stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas mi pham pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor padma chen po'i dbang bskur ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i padma bcings pas spyi bor mngon par @311b dbang bskur bar 'gyur to //
translated: By reciting it one thousand and eight times, one will be consecrated on the crown of one’s head by the binding of the wish-granting jewel lotus of the great lotus consecration of all the maṇḍala deities of the Tathāgata Ajita.

original: de nas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la de'i rmi lam mthong ba nye bar ston par byed do //
analyzed: de nas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la de'i rmi lam mthong ba nye bar ston par byed do //
translated: Then, by merely reciting it, those tathāgatas of the three times will cause one to see in one’s dream

original: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / cho 'phrul ston par byed do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / cho 'phrul ston par byed do //
translated: the great maṇḍala emanation and display.

original: gzhal yas khang dang bcas /
analyzed: gzhal yas khang dang bcas /
translated: together with the celestial mansion,

original: rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas /
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas /
translated: together with the emanations,

original: lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams nye bar ston par byed do //
analyzed: lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams nye bar ston par byed do //
translated: and together with the assembly of deities, the maṇḍala deities of the king of knowledge will be revealed.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
translated: the maṇḍala of the Tathāgata family, the maṇḍala of the lotus family, the maṇḍala of the vajra family, the maṇḍala of the jewel family, the great maṇḍala of the essence of Amoghapaśa’s liberation,

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams thams cad kyang so so so so'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams thams cad kyang so so so so'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ro //
translated: and the great maṇḍala of the essence of Vairocana. All of them were fully empowered by the empowerment in each individual maṇḍala.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mtha' dag nye bar ston par byed do //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mtha' dag nye bar ston par byed do //
translated: They revealed all the maṇḍala deities of the king of knowledge.

original: ji srid du byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar ston par byed do //
analyzed: ji srid du byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar ston par byed do //
translated: They revealed the maṇḍala up to going to the seat of awakening, turning the wheel of Dharma, and taming Māra.

original: dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams kyis so so so so'i dkyil 'khor @312a *//
analyzed: dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams kyis so so so so'i dkyil 'khor @312a *//
translated: Those Tathāgatas of the three times also, in each of those great maṇḍalas,

original: du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
analyzed: du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
translated: conferred the highest consecration by means of the consecration of each individual maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi mchog thams cad du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi mchog thams cad du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
translated: They conferred the highest consecration in all the supreme maṇḍalas.

original: de nas rig sngags 'chang de de lta bu'i rmi lam chen po mthong nas dga' ba chen po rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rig sngags 'chang de de lta bu'i rmi lam chen po mthong nas dga' ba chen po rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, the knowledge-holder, having seen such a great dream, will experience a great expansion of joy.

original: dga' ba dang rab tu mgu ba'i snying des kyang don yod pa padma dri ma med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang de la legs so legs so //
analyzed: dga' ba dang rab tu mgu ba'i snying des kyang don yod pa padma dri ma med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo // de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang de la legs so legs so //
translated: With a mind of joy and delight, he will attain the samādhi of the consecration of the stainless lotus of Amoghasiddhi.

original: zhes brjod par mdzad de /
analyzed: zhes brjod par mdzad de /
translated: Those Tathāgatas will also say to that knowledge-holder, Excellent, excellent!

original: rig sngags 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs thun mong pa'i dam tshig gis mngon par dbang bskur bas khyod mngon par dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs thun mong pa'i dam tshig gis mngon par dbang bskur bas khyod mngon par dbang bskur ro //
translated: “You have been consecrated by the consecration of the pledge of the common clan of the great maṇḍala of all the tathāgatas, O great awareness holder.

original: grub pa thob pa de rnams rig sngags 'chang chen po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug cing /
analyzed: grub pa thob pa de rnams rig sngags 'chang chen po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug cing /
translated: Those who have attained accomplishment, O great awareness holder, will enter the secret maṇḍala

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bor 'gyur ro //
translated: and become the chief son of all the tathāgatas.”

original: zhes so sor song ngo //
analyzed: zhes so sor song ngo //
translated: Thus they departed.

original: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas pa tsam dang / bklags pa tsam gyis de ma thag par rgya chen po'i yon tan gsal ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas pa tsam dang / bklags pa tsam gyis de ma thag par rgya chen po'i yon tan gsal ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Then, by merely reciting and merely reading, the great awareness holder will immediately give rise to such a vast and clear quality.

original: slar yang 'di'i gong nas gong du rnam par 'phrul pa ston par byed do //🔽rig sngags 'chang gang yang rigs @312b kyi bu'am /
analyzed: slar yang 'di'i gong nas gong du rnam par 'phrul pa ston par byed do // rig sngags 'chang gang yang rigs @312b kyi bu'am /
translated: Moreover, he will display emanations higher and higher.🔽Any awareness holder,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang yang rung bar gyur kyang rung /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang yang rung bar gyur kyang rung /
translated: whether a son of clan or a daughter of clan,

original: dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mar gyur kyang rung ste dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba byed par 'dod pa das gzungs kyi snying po 'di'i bgrang phreng ngam /🔽cod pan nam /
analyzed: dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mar gyur kyang rung ste dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba byed par 'dod pa das gzungs kyi snying po 'di'i bgrang phreng ngam / cod pan nam /
translated: “Whether one is a monk, a nun, a layman, or a laywoman, if one wishes to make offerings and confer empowerment upon all the tathāgatas of the three times, one should recite this dhāraṇī mantra one thousand and eight times on a rosary,🔽a diadem,

original: dar dpyangs sam /
analyzed: dar dpyangs sam /
translated: a pendant,

original: dbu rgyan la lan stong rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bcings na /
analyzed: dbu rgyan la lan stong rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bcings na /
translated: or a crown, and tie it on the head of the tathāgatas.

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mngon par dbang bskur te /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mngon par dbang bskur te /
translated: Avalokiteśvara will confer empowerment.

original: rig sngags 'chang de'am /
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang de'am /
translated: The knowledge-holder,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: son of noble family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo'am /
translated: daughter of noble family,🔽monk,

original: dge slong ngam /🔽dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong ngam / dge slong ma'am /
translated: nun,

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /
translated: or layman

original: dge bsnyen mas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po re re'i dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i nor bu rin po che'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan 'od zer sna tshogs brgya stong phrag 'bar bas yang
analyzed: dge bsnyen mas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po re re'i dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i nor bu rin po che'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan 'od zer sna tshogs brgya stong phrag 'bar bas yang
translated: adorn the crowns of all the tathāgatas of the three times and the assembly of bodhisattvas with the great crown ornament of the precious wish-fulfilling jewel of Vairocana’s essence, which is made from the seven precious substances, and with the great crown ornament of the precious wish-fulfilling jewel that is adorned with various blazing hundreds of thousands of light rays.

original: dag par brgyan pa'i dbu brgyan chen po dang / dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dag par brgyan pa'i dbu brgyan chen po dang / dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: They confer empowerment with the hanging tassels, and all tathāgatas confer empowerment.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa mngon par @313a *//🔽dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa mngon par @313a *//🔽dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The assembly of bodhisattvas and their retinues confer empowerment.

original: de ltar rgya che zhing yangs pa che ba'i gzhal med khang 'di mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rgya che zhing yangs pa che ba'i gzhal med khang 'di mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, this vast and great celestial mansion will be present for worship and service.

original: gang gis dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba chen por byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba chen por byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one will have made great offerings, service, and empowerment to all the tathāgatas of the three times, together with their retinues of bodhisattvas and the deities of the maṇḍala.

original: snying po 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gdug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /🔽rnam par nyams par byed /
analyzed: snying po 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gdug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur / rnam par nyams par byed /
translated: By merely reciting this essence mantra, the vidyādhara’s negative actions, obscurations, and all poisons will be pacified.🔽They will be destroyed.

original: rnam par zhig par byed /
analyzed: rnam par zhig par byed /
translated: They will be annihilated.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: One’s body, speech, and mind will be purified.

original: nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa dang bral zhing nges par grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa dang bral zhing nges par grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be free from afflictions and obscurations and will be definitely liberated.

original: bsod nams kyi phung po chen po gsog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi phung po chen po gsog par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will accumulate a great heap of merit.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will possess great roots of virtue.

original: dngos grub chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: They will attain the supreme great powers.

original: thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be unimpeded in all ways.

original: mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / tshig btsun par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / tshig btsun par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be worshipped, revered, and their word will be respected.

original: sdig pa thun tshags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig pa thun tshags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be free from the burden of misdeeds.

original: lus la dri bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus la dri bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Their bodies will emit a sweet fragrance.

original: rtag tu de dran pas kha nas autpa la'i dri 'byin no //
analyzed: rtag tu de dran pas kha nas autpa la'i dri 'byin no //
translated: Always remembering him, they will emit the fragrance of utpala flowers from their mouths.

original: lus tsandan gyi dris bsgos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus tsandan gyi dris bsgos par 'gyur ro //
translated: Their bodies will be anointed with the fragrance of sandalwood.

original: sems can thams cad @313b mchog tu byams pa dang / mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad @313b mchog tu byams pa dang / mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be supremely loving and worthy of offerings to all sentient beings.

original: thams cad du dngos grub chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du dngos grub chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: They will attain the supreme great powers in all ways.

original: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will subdue all obstructing forces and negative influences.

original: 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dvags dang / sha za thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis ring du 'bros par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dvags dang / sha za thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis ring du 'bros par 'gyur ro //
translated: All bhūtas, yakṣas, rākṣasas, pretas, and piśācas will flee far away just from seeing it.

original: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will remain close by for as long as one lives.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Ārya Avalokiteśvara will grant boons.

original: rtag tu yang mthong bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu yang mthong bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will always appear.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po yang rtag par rgyun du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po yang rtag par rgyun du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The king of knowledge will always follow.

original: dus rgyun du rtag tu mthong ba rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus rgyun du rtag tu mthong ba rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will always appear and follow.

original: rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba dang / dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba dang / dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
translated: He will always follow and grant spiritual powers.

original: thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be consecrated as a maṇḍala master in all respects.

original: thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: One will have the supreme, unfailing spiritual power in all respects.

original: don yod pa padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ba'i gzungs so ////
analyzed: don yod pa padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ba'i gzungs so ////
translated: This is the dhāraṇī of the consecration of the Amoghapāśa maṇḍala.

original: de nas don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho gar 'gyur te /

analyzed: dam tshig mi shes pa rnams la dam tshig sbyin pa'o //
