analyzed: dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rig sngags 'chang yang bar snang la gnas so //
translated: One will see the maṇḍala and become a knowledge-holder dwelling in space.

original: de'i skad cig la ting nge 'dzin thob ste dkyil 'khor tu zhugs pa'i mod la cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad rtag tu myur du 'byung la /
analyzed: de'i skad cig la ting nge 'dzin thob ste dkyil 'khor tu zhugs pa'i mod la cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad rtag tu myur du 'byung la /
translated: In that instant, one will attain meditative concentration. As soon as one enters the maṇḍala, the unsurpassed accomplishment of the extensive rite and all accomplishments will always occur swiftly.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will hear the sound of “excellent” from the center of the maṇḍala of the king of knowledge.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub brjod do //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub brjod do //
translated: the accomplishment of the king of knowledge, the unexcelled; and the accomplishment of the Amogha-pāśa.

original: ji ltar yid la byed pa thams cad myur du 'dzin to //
analyzed: ji ltar yid la byed pa thams cad myur du 'dzin to //
translated: All mental activities are quickly apprehended.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten @352b las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten @352b las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob ste /
translated: One attains mundane and supramundane accomplishments.

original: 'di la the tshom med do //
analyzed: 'di la the tshom med do //
translated: There is no doubt about this.

original: sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: All those sentient beings who have entered the maṇḍala will become irreversible and will receive a prophecy of their unsurpassed perfect awakening.

original: byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do //
translated: Seated at the site of awakening, they will turn the wheel of Dharma.

original: sems can gang dkyil 'khor de mthong nas sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams dang / mnar med par gzhol ba de thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing bde blag tu sangs rgyas nyid du 'gro'o //
analyzed: sems can gang dkyil 'khor de mthong nas sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams dang / mnar med par gzhol ba de thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing bde blag tu sangs rgyas nyid du 'gro'o //
translated: Any sentient being who sees that maṇḍala will destroy all their misdeeds, obscurations, the five inexpiable acts, and so forth, and will easily go to buddhahood.

original: de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo chen po dang / khro bo lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mong pa'i phyag rgya dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa /
analyzed: de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo chen po dang / khro bo lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mong pa'i phyag rgya dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa /
translated: Then, in the great detailed rites of the Amoghaṃśu, the wrathful Aṅkuśa, the king of awareness mantras, and the great maṇḍala of the essence of the Amoghaṃśa, all the mudrās of the common family of all tathāgatas perform all virtuous actions.

original: 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa /
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa /
translated: They terrify all bhūtas.

original: gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad 'bros par byed pa /
analyzed: gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad 'bros par byed pa /
translated: They cause all yakṣas and rākṣasas to flee.

original: bgegs thams cad rnam par skrag par byed pa /
analyzed: bgegs thams cad rnam par skrag par byed pa /
translated: They completely terrify all obstructors.

original: 'dod pa'i ris rnams sreg bar byed pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i ris rnams sreg bar byed pa /
translated: They burn the classes of desire.

original: gdug pa'i klu rnams 'khrug par byed pa /
analyzed: gdug pa'i klu rnams 'khrug par byed pa /
translated: It agitates the malevolent nāgas.

original: sa'i mthil g-yo bar byed pa /
analyzed: sa'i mthil g-yo bar byed pa /
translated: It causes the surface of the earth to tremble.

original: lha'i me tog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa dang / lha'i gos dang / lhab lhub kyi char 'bebs par byed pa /🔽dus gsum du @353a *//
analyzed: lha'i me tog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa dang / lha'i gos dang / lhab lhub kyi char 'bebs par byed pa / dus gsum du @353a *//
translated: It beautifies with divine flowers and various jewels and causes a rain of divine garments and ornaments to fall.

original: gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par skul bar byed pa /
analyzed: gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par skul bar byed pa /
translated: It summons the buddhas of the three times.🔽It invites all the tathāgatas of the ten directions.

original: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snyan gsan 'bebs par byed pa; sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snyan gsan 'bebs par byed pa; sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa /
translated: It invites all the gods who dwell in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa /
translated: It refreshes all bodhisattvas.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par byed pa /
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par byed pa /
translated: It summons all the vidyārāja and maṇḍala deities.

original: bde ba thams cad dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par byed pa /
analyzed: bde ba thams cad dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par byed pa /
translated: It causes the attainment of all happiness and the stage of nonregression.

original: bla na med pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa /
analyzed: bla na med pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa /
translated: It causes the attainment of the stage of unsurpassed awakening.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa /🔽chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar byed pa /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa / chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar byed pa /
translated: It causes the wheel of Dharma to be turned.🔽It causes the lamp of Dharma to blaze.

original: chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa /
translated: It causes the Dharma conch to be blown.

original: phyag rgya dang chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya dang chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa /
translated: It causes the Dharma seal and victory banner to be raised.

original: cho ga zhib mo dang gsang sngags bla na med pa thams cad grub pa /
analyzed: cho ga zhib mo dang gsang sngags bla na med pa thams cad grub pa /
translated: It accomplishes all the secret mantra and the detailed rites.

original: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa /🔽phyag rgya dang / mchog thams cad sbyin par byed pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa / phyag rgya dang / mchog thams cad sbyin par byed pa /
translated: It grants all wishes.🔽It grants all the supreme seals.

original: gsang sngags thams cad 'chang ba /
analyzed: gsang sngags thams cad 'chang ba /
translated: It holds all the secret mantras.

original: gzungs rnams kyis khyad par grub pa /
analyzed: gzungs rnams kyis khyad par grub pa /
translated: It accomplishes the dhāraṇīs.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa /
translated: It causes entry into all the secret maṇḍalas of all the tathāgatas.

original: gang gis rnam par snang mdzad dang / thub pa brgyad pa'i dam tshig gi gnas thams cad la gnas pa /🔽sdig pa thams cad nyams @353b par byed pa /
analyzed: gang gis rnam par snang mdzad dang / thub pa brgyad pa'i dam tshig gi gnas thams cad la gnas pa / sdig pa thams cad nyams @353b par byed pa /
translated: It causes abiding in all the places of the commitments of Vairocana and the eight sages.🔽It destroys all evil.

original: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa /
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa /
translated: It purifies all obscurations.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams sreg par byed pa /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams sreg par byed pa /
translated: It burns away all afflictions.

original: rtag tu 'khor ba las 'don par byed pa /
analyzed: rtag tu 'khor ba las 'don par byed pa /
translated: It always delivers from saṃsāra.

original: bdud dang ma rungs pa rnams las sgrol ba po /
analyzed: bdud dang ma rungs pa rnams las sgrol ba po /
translated: It liberates from māras and evil ones.

original: rtag tu chos kyi zam stegs mchog /
analyzed: rtag tu chos kyi zam stegs mchog /
translated: It is always the supreme bridge of the Dharma.

original: rga ba dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba las grol bar byed pa /
analyzed: rga ba dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba las grol bar byed pa /
translated: It liberates from old age, birth, and death.

original: srid pa mi bzad pa ston par nus pa /
analyzed: srid pa mi bzad pa ston par nus pa /
translated: It is able to show the unbearable existence.

original: tshul khrims dang / gtong ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ting 'dzin rnams kyi dri zhim po sbyin zhing srung bar byed pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / gtong ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ting 'dzin rnams kyi dri zhim po sbyin zhing srung bar byed pa /
translated: It gives and protects the sweet fragrance of discipline, generosity, diligence, concentration, insight, and samādhi.🔽It perfects the six perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa; sbyin pa'i rin po che'i phung po chen po rtag tu sbyin pa /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa; sbyin pa'i rin po che'i phung po chen po rtag tu sbyin pa /
translated: It always gives the great heap of the jewel of generosity.

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha thams cad la mchod par byed pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha thams cad la mchod par byed pa /
translated: It makes offerings to all the buddhas, bodhisattvas, and gods.

original: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
translated: It fulfills all wishes.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: It is the consecration of the mudrā of all tathāgatas.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par byed pa /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par byed pa /
translated: It is the display of all the magical manifestations of the samādhi that is like an illusion.

original: gzugs sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar byed pa /
analyzed: gzugs sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar byed pa /
translated: It is the display of various forms and various miraculous manifestations.

original: rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
translated: It is the perfection of miraculous powers.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed pa /
translated: It is the display of the mudrā of the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po 'di la gnas par byed pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po 'di la gnas par byed pa /
translated: It is the essence of the realm of phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa /
translated: It is the magical manifestation of all tathāgatas.

original: ma rungs pa thams cad dang / gdon dang nad thams cad rtag tu rnam @354a *//🔽par 'jig par byed pa /
analyzed: ma rungs pa thams cad dang / gdon dang nad thams cad rtag tu rnam @354a *// par 'jig par byed pa /
translated: It is the constant destruction of all that is unruly, all spirits, and all diseases.

original: phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlog par byed pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlog par byed pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the accomplishment of the warding off of all adversaries, enemies, and opposing armies.

original: 'jigs pa rnams thams cad dang / 'jigs pa mi bzang ba brgyad po rnams kyis 'jigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa rnams thams cad dang / 'jigs pa mi bzang ba brgyad po rnams kyis 'jigs pa med pa'o //
translated: He is fearless in all fears, and fearless in the eight great fears.

original: drug dang / byad stems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad nyams par byed par the tshom med pa zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: drug dang / byad stems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad nyams par byed par the tshom med pa zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o //
translated: He is the one who destroys the six, the evil spirits, and all the sorcery and magical spells, without a doubt.

original: lag pa gnyis ldog nas lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo'i sor mo dang / sdigs mdzub nyid bskums la sor mo gsum brkyangs la snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis ldog nas lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo'i sor mo dang / sdigs mdzub nyid bskums la sor mo gsum brkyangs la snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste /
translated: One should turn the two hands over, and with the thumbs and index fingers of both hands one should form a fist, and extend the three fingers, and place it at the heart center.

original: 'di ni / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam par mchog sbyin pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam par mchog sbyin pa ste /
translated: This is the mudrā of Amogha-aṅkuśa, the wish-fulfilling gem, the supreme giver.

original: phyag rgya brgya stong phrag bye ba gnyis tsam du bcings par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya brgya stong phrag bye ba gnyis tsam du bcings par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is as if one were to bind two hundred thousand million mudrās.

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / padma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / padma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pas te /
translated: Moreover, it is the mudrā of the Tathāgata family, the mudrā of the maṇḍala of the vast lotus, the mudrā of the Vajra family, and the mudrā of the Jewel family.

original: phyag rgya so so so so ba 'di rnams thams cad phyag rgya bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya so so so so ba 'di rnams thams cad phyag rgya bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: All these individual mudrās become a hundred thousand million mudrās.

original: bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu byed do //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu byed do //
translated: It creates a great heap of merit.

original: phyag rgya 'di ni /🔽yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog sbyin pa po /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di ni / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog sbyin pa po /
translated: This mudrā🔽is the giver of the supreme wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po don yod pa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po don yod pa'i snying po'o //
translated: It is the lord Avalokiteśvara, Amoghadarśin.

original: @354b shin tu gsang ba'i las thams cad du don yod pa'o //
analyzed: @354b shin tu gsang ba'i las thams cad du don yod pa'o //
translated: It is the unfailing one in all secret activities.

original: dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa dang rigs thun mong ba'i gsang ba dang / dam tshig thams cad du mthong ba'o //
analyzed: dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa dang rigs thun mong ba'i gsang ba dang / dam tshig thams cad du mthong ba'o //
translated: It is the secret and common family of all the Tathāgatas of the three times, and it is the vision of all commitments.

original: phyag rgya 'di'i ji ltar ba'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di'i ji ltar ba'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: By this seal, all desires are fulfilled, and the chariot of the mind is completely perfected.

original: mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It bestows all the supreme.

original: phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis gung mo'i sor mos mthe bong gi sor mo bskums la sdigs mdzub gyis bsdigs par bya /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis gung mo'i sor mos mthe bong gi sor mo bskums la sdigs mdzub gyis bsdigs par bya /
translated: With this very seal, the middle finger is bent to the thumb, and the index finger is extended to threaten.

original: mid med dang / mthe chung dag gcig tu brkyang la sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag nas snying ga'i gnas bzhag ste /
analyzed: mid med dang / mthe chung dag gcig tu brkyang la sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag nas snying ga'i gnas bzhag ste /
translated: The little fingers are extended together, and the nails are placed evenly, and it is placed at the heart center.

original: khro bo'i lta ba dang mtshungs par bzhag pas h'um yig gis bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta ba dang mtshungs par bzhag pas h'um yig gis bcing bar bya'o //
translated: By placing it with the same gaze as the wrathful one, it is bound with the syllable hūṃ.

original: 'di ni / khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya khro bo thams cad kyi mchog dang / gtso bor brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya khro bo thams cad kyi mchog dang / gtso bor brjod par bya ste /
translated: This is the wrathful iron hook seal, which is said to be the supreme and chief of all wrathful ones.

original: rigs bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams kyi thun mong ba'i phyag rgya thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams kyi thun mong ba'i phyag rgya thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is the common seal of a hundred thousand million families, and all wrathful ones are engaged by it.

original: phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis khro bo'i phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin du padma'i rigs gang yin pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs su brjod pa gang yin pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje drag pos 'jigs par byed do //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis khro bo'i phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin du padma'i rigs gang yin pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs su brjod pa gang yin pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje drag pos 'jigs par byed do //
translated: One will be called a tathāgata, and likewise, one will be called a lotus family, a vajra family, and a wrathful vajra.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni /
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni /
translated: This king of wrathful ones

original: thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal por brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal por brjod par bya ste /
translated: should be called the king of all wrathful ones.

original: nor bu'i rigs gang yin pa'i khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams gdug pa rnams @355a *//
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs gang yin pa'i khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams gdug pa rnams @355a *//
translated: The mudrās of the wrathful ones of the jewel family

original: 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o //
translated: grant fearlessness to the wicked.

original: thams cad du phyag rgya'i gtso bo zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du phyag rgya'i gtso bo zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o //
translated: In all cases, the mudrā of the king of wrathful ones is called the foremost mudrā, the unsurpassed king of wrathful ones.

original: de bzhin du khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di 'ching bzhin pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di 'ching bzhin pa /
translated: Likewise, this mudrā of the wrathful one with the iron hook, when formed,

original: ri rab lhun po brgya stong phrag dang / rgya mtsho yang skem par byed do //
analyzed: ri rab lhun po brgya stong phrag dang / rgya mtsho yang skem par byed do //
translated: will dry up the oceans and hundreds of thousands of Mount Merus.

original: ri rab lhun po'i ri ni /
analyzed: ri rab lhun po'i ri ni /
translated: The mountain of Mount Meru

original: rdul phra rab ji lta bar rnam par 'thor bar byed do //
analyzed: rdul phra rab ji lta bar rnam par 'thor bar byed do //
translated: Just like the subtlest particles, they will be scattered.

original: rgya mtsho thams cad kyang skem par byed do //
analyzed: rgya mtsho thams cad kyang skem par byed do //
translated: All the oceans will dry up.

original: ri dang / ri bo yang nyams par byed do //
analyzed: ri dang / ri bo yang nyams par byed do //
translated: The mountains and hills will be destroyed.

original: lha ma yin ma rungs pa rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / de'i gnas kyi klu ma rungs pa rnams sreg par byed do //
analyzed: lha ma yin ma rungs pa rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / de'i gnas kyi klu ma rungs pa rnams sreg par byed do //
translated: The wicked asuras and the asura lords Rāhu and so forth, and the wicked nāgas in their abodes will be burned.

original: de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon ma rungs pa dang / gegs byed pa'i lha ma rungs pa gang yin pa dang / bdud kyi rigs rnams gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon ma rungs pa dang / gegs byed pa'i lha ma rungs pa gang yin pa dang / bdud kyi rigs rnams gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur la /
translated: In the same way, the wicked yakṣas, rākṣasas, bhūtas, grahas, and wicked obstructors, and all the classes of māras will be consumed by a single blaze.

original: phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de lha rnams thams cad rtag tu nyams par byed cing /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de lha rnams thams cad rtag tu nyams par byed cing /
translated: By merely holding the mudrā, all the gods will always be destroyed.

original: skad cig de la 'jigs par byed do //
analyzed: skad cig de la 'jigs par byed do //
translated: In that very instant, they will be terrified.

original: phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis phyir rgol pa dang / dgra dang / de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i sems can 'jigs par byed pa de rnams thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis phyir rgol pa dang / dgra dang / de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i sems can 'jigs par byed pa de rnams thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar byed do //
translated: Merely by holding the mudrā, all adversaries, enemies, and likewise all fearsome beings will go for refuge.

original: phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do //
analyzed: phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do //
translated: In all mudrās, mantras, and maṇḍalas, it will accomplish all activities.

original: thams cad 'grub pa don yod cing dge ba thams cad 'grub par byed do //
analyzed: thams cad 'grub pa don yod cing dge ba thams cad 'grub par byed do //
translated: It will accomplish all activities, and it will accomplish all that is virtuous and meaningful.

original: phyag rgya @355b 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par bskums la gung mo yid tsam bskums te ming med dang / mthe bong gis sor mo'i sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya @355b 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par bskums la gung mo yid tsam bskums te ming med dang / mthe bong gis sor mo'i sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag ste /
translated: From this very mudrā, the two threatening forefingers should be bent in the form of a vajra, the middle fingers slightly bent, and the ring fingers and thumbs should be placed evenly with the fingernails.

original: mthe'u chung brkyang nas snying ga'i gnas su bzhag pa 'di ni /
analyzed: mthe'u chung brkyang nas snying ga'i gnas su bzhag pa 'di ni /
translated: The little fingers should be extended and placed at the heart center.

original: rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po /
analyzed: rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po /
translated: This is the great knowledge mudrā.

original: don yod pa'i phyag rgya rmad du byung ba chen po /
analyzed: don yod pa'i phyag rgya rmad du byung ba chen po /
translated: It is the great, marvelous mudrā of Amogha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rigs thun mong pa'i phyag rgya /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rigs thun mong pa'i phyag rgya /
translated: It is the seal common to all the tathāgatas.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bla na med pa /
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bla na med pa /
translated: It is the unsurpassed of all the vidyārājas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mgon pos snyan par brjod cing lung bstan pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mgon pos snyan par brjod cing lung bstan pa /
translated: It is the sweet-sounding and prophetic seal of the guardians of the world.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa /
translated: It is the seal that all the tathāgatas call the chief of the tathāgata family.

original: de bzhin du padma'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rigs pa'i rgyal po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtso bo ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du padma'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rigs pa'i rgyal po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtso bo ste /
translated: In the same way, it is the chief of the lotus family, the chief of the vajra family, the chief of the jewel family, the king of families, the seal, the mantra, and the chief of all maṇḍalas.

original: gang gis phyag rgya 'di 'ching ba de /
analyzed: gang gis phyag rgya 'di 'ching ba de /
translated: Whoever forms this seal

original: gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag gi phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag gi phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings par 'gyur ro //
translated: will form the seals of as many tathāgatas as there are grains of sand in one hundred thousand Ganges Rivers.

original: sdig pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi bzad pa dang / gdug pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do //
analyzed: sdig pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi bzad pa dang / gdug pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do //
translated: It destroys all evil, afflictions, and wickedness.

original: bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong phrag bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong phrag bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: It generates hundreds of thousands of heaps of merit.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun nas bskyed par 'gyur ro //🔽phyag rgya 'dzin @356a *//
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun nas bskyed par 'gyur ro // phyag rgya 'dzin @356a *//
translated: It causes the roots of virtue to be generated.

original: pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs par byed cing dgongs bar byed de /
analyzed: pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs par byed cing dgongs bar byed de /
translated: Merely by holding the mudrā, one will be seen and considered by all the tathāgatas.

original: the tshom med do //
analyzed: the tshom med do //
translated: There is no doubt.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be granted the supreme boon of all bodhisattvas.

original: lha rnams kyis rtag par rgyun tu srung bar byed do //
analyzed: lha rnams kyis rtag par rgyun tu srung bar byed do //
translated: The gods will always and continuously protect one.

original: phyag rgya 'di'i phan yon sngar brjod pas gzhal du med cid grangs med la tshad med par rab tu bsgrags shing the tshom med do //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di'i phan yon sngar brjod pas gzhal du med cid grangs med la tshad med par rab tu bsgrags shing the tshom med do //
translated: The benefits of this mudrā have been proclaimed as immeasurable, countless, and limitless by the previous [buddhas]. There is no doubt.

original: phyag rgya 'di mthong ba dang / bcings pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bskyed do //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di mthong ba dang / bcings pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bskyed do //
translated: Merely by seeing and forming this mudrā, one generates a heap of merit.

original: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil du gcig brkyangs la dpung pa brkums te /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil du gcig brkyangs la dpung pa brkums te /
translated: Extend one [finger] on the palm of the right hand, and bend the arm.

original: ming med dang / mthe bong gi sor mo 'dud la mthe chung bskum par bya'o //
analyzed: ming med dang / mthe bong gi sor mo 'dud la mthe chung bskum par bya'o //
translated: The ring finger and the thumb should be bent.

original: ming med kyi mthar reg la gung mo bskums la sdigs mdzub rab tu brkyangs te snying ga'i gnas su 'di g-yo ba tsam mo //
analyzed: ming med kyi mthar reg la gung mo bskums la sdigs mdzub rab tu brkyangs te snying ga'i gnas su 'di g-yo ba tsam mo //
translated: Touch the end of the ring finger, bend the middle finger, and extend the index finger. This is the mudra of the heart center.

original: me tog gam /
analyzed: me tog gam /
translated: Flowers,

original: dri dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos sam /
analyzed: dri dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos sam /
translated: incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, clothes,

original: rgyan dang / sdud pa rnams kyang lag pa g-yon du bzung nas dbul bar bya ste /
analyzed: rgyan dang / sdud pa rnams kyang lag pa g-yon du bzung nas dbul bar bya ste /
translated: ornaments, and offerings should be held in the left hand and offered.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha rnams dang / de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po rnams dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi de rnams thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha rnams dang / de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po rnams dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi de rnams thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro //
translated: All the tathāgatas, bodhisattvas, gods, and likewise the kings of knowledge, and likewise the deities of the maṇḍala—all of them will be worshipped.

original: lha rdzas kyi mchod pa bla na med pa dang / @356b mchog dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa'i mchod pa 'di rnams byed de /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi mchod pa bla na med pa dang / @356b mchog dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa'i mchod pa 'di rnams byed de /
translated: They make the most excellent, supreme, sublime, and exquisite offerings of divine substances.

original: ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang / ro brgya ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa bdud rtsi bcud kyis len gyi mchod pa 'di rnams byed do //
analyzed: ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang / ro brgya ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa bdud rtsi bcud kyis len gyi mchod pa 'di rnams byed do //
translated: They make offerings of various kinds of food, fruits of a hundred flavors, and various kinds of drinks, including the elixir of immortality.

original: phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas rin po che sna ba dun gyi char 'byung ngo //
analyzed: phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas rin po che sna ba dun gyi char 'byung ngo //
translated: In the ten directions, rains of the seven precious substances fall.

original: gser dang dngul gyi me tog bla na med pa dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba nyi ma dang gzi brjid mtshungs pas 'bar bar byed do //
analyzed: gser dang dngul gyi me tog bla na med pa dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba nyi ma dang gzi brjid mtshungs pas 'bar bar byed do //
translated: They make offerings of unsurpassed golden and silver flowers, and various precious substances that shine with the brilliance of the sun.

original: phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu zhes bya ba 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu zhes bya ba 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste /
translated: Merely by holding the mudra, the wish-fulfilling jewel called the “jewel of unfailing offerings”🔽is obtained.

original: rtag tu phyag rgya'i gsang ba dang / gsang sngags rnams yid kyis bsam pas de rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu phyag rgya'i gsang ba dang / gsang sngags rnams yid kyis bsam pas de rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By always mentally contemplating the secret mudrā and the secret mantras, all of them will be accomplished.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing dang mnyam zhing mtshungs par ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mchod pa thams cad byed de /
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing dang mnyam zhing mtshungs par ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mchod pa thams cad byed de /
translated: Like a wish-fulfilling tree, it will perform all offerings just as one wishes.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag stong rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyang re re'i dus gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya 'di'i mthus bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag stong rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyang re re'i dus gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya 'di'i mthus bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par byed do //
translated: The buddhas of a hundred thousand times ten million buddha-fields, each of the tathāgatas of the three times, will be worshipped with all unsurpassed offerings by the power of this mudrā.

original: de'i phyir phyag rgya 'di rtag tu byed pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyag rgya 'di rtag tu byed pa ni /
translated: Therefore, always performing this mudrā,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the six perfections will be perfected.

original: phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pa ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pa ni /
translated: While holding the mudrā,

original: mchod pa bla na med pa dang / tshegs chung ngus mchod pa chung du yang tshad med @357a *//
analyzed: mchod pa bla na med pa dang / tshegs chung ngus mchod pa chung du yang tshad med @357a *//
translated: even a small offering made with little difficulty will be immeasurable and unsurpassed.

original: par rab tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par rab tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The seal of the Buddha’s crown.

original: sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa byed do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa byed do //
translated: One will create an inconceivable and incomparable mass of merit from generosity.

original: ri rab lhun po bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ri rab lhun po bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba de bzhin du /
translated: One should fill a billion Mount Sumerus with the seven precious substances and offer them to each of the tathāgatas.

original: phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pas de bzhin gshegs pa re re la de lta bu'i mchod pa'i cho ga byed do //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pas de bzhin gshegs pa re re la de lta bu'i mchod pa'i cho ga byed do //
translated: While holding the seal, one should perform such an offering rite for each of the tathāgatas.

original: de lta bu'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni /
translated: Such a seal rite is a magical display.

original: 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: It is blessed by the guide Lokeśvara.

original: phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gung mo la reg pa ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gung mo la reg pa ni /
translated: From this very seal, touching the index finger to the middle finger,

original: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / dam tshig la 'jug pa dang / bskor ba byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / de bzhin du dri dang / mar me dang /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / dam tshig la 'jug pa dang / bskor ba byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / de bzhin du dri dang / mar me dang /
translated: and likewise, perfume,🔽lamps,🔽garlands,🔽ointment,🔽and bali offerings,🔽and likewise, bathing,🔽touching,🔽clothing,🔽binding the uṣṇīṣa,🔽protecting oneself,🔽protecting others,

original: phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma 'bul bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du khrus dang / nye reg nyid dang / gos bgo ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang /
analyzed: phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma 'bul bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du khrus dang / nye reg nyid dang / gos bgo ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang /
translated: and likewise, protecting friends,🔽recite the mantra,🔽bind the cross-legged posture,🔽the rite of homa,🔽inviting others,🔽inviting the mantra,🔽accomplishing spiritual powers,

original: bzlas bzhin pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang / skyil mo krung bcing ba dang / sbyin sreg gi las dang / gzhan spyan drang ba nyid dang / gsang sngags spyan drang ba nyid dang / dngos grub sgrub pa @357b nyid dang / thams cad nas thams cad du bya ba thams cad phyag rgya 'dis byed de /
analyzed: bzlas bzhin pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang / skyil mo krung bcing ba dang / sbyin sreg gi las dang / gzhan spyan drang ba nyid dang / gsang sngags spyan drang ba nyid dang / dngos grub sgrub pa @357b nyid dang / thams cad nas thams cad du bya ba thams cad phyag rgya 'dis byed de /
translated: and all activities are performed with this mudra.

original: gnas thams cad du song ba dang / gnas grub pa dang / bya ba thams cad legs par bsngags pa dang / thams cad du mchog gi phyag rgya don yod pa'i las rab tu grub pa dang / yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang / thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor du; don yod pa sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gnas thams cad du song ba dang / gnas grub pa dang / bya ba thams cad legs par bsngags pa dang / thams cad du mchog gi phyag rgya don yod pa'i las rab tu grub pa dang / yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang / thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor du; don yod pa sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the accomplishment of all activities, the praise of all activities, the accomplishment of all supreme seals, the generation of all qualities, and the accomplishment of the rite of the seal of the one who accomplishes the meaningful in all mandalas of the common lineage.

original: don yod pa'i las zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: don yod pa'i las zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: This seal called “meaningful activity” should be called “the bestowal of the supreme meaning.”

original: phyag rgya chen po lnga po 'di rnams rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / don yod pa thos pa nyid dang / don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po lnga po 'di rnams rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / don yod pa thos pa nyid dang / don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
translated: These five great seals are the seeing of the truth of the marvelous, the hearing of the meaningful, the seeing of the meaningful result, the accumulation of the meaningful merit, and the truth of the meaningful Dharma.

original: don yod par sdig pa nyams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / don yod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang /
analyzed: don yod par sdig pa nyams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / don yod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang /
translated: The seal of the accomplishment of all aims, the seal of the destruction of all evil, the seal of the exhaustion of all obscurations, the seal of the total destruction of all afflictions, the seal of the vision of all buddhas, the seal of the vision of all buddha-fields,

original: don yod par tshe 'phel bar byed pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: don yod par tshe 'phel bar byed pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: the seal of the increase of all life, and the seal of the bestowal of the supreme spiritual power.

original: snying po dang / phyag rgya 'di 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsgrags pa'o //
analyzed: snying po dang / phyag rgya 'di 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsgrags pa'o //
translated: This essence and this seal were proclaimed by Avalokiteśvara for the benefit of all sentient beings.🔽If the mantra adepts, in particular, were to form this seal day and night,

original: rig @358a *// sngags 'chang rnams kyis khyad par du nyin mtshan du dang / thun mtshams su yang phyag rgya 'di 'ching na /
analyzed: rig @358a *// sngags 'chang rnams kyis khyad par du nyin mtshan du dang / thun mtshams su yang phyag rgya 'di 'ching na /
translated: and at the six times,

original: bkra shis pa'i mchog bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub dam par gyur pa'i mchog sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: bkra shis pa'i mchog bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub dam par gyur pa'i mchog sbyin par byed do //
translated: It bestows the supreme gift of the highest accomplishments of merit, purity, the destruction of evil, and the attainment of the supreme goal.

original: 'di ni / thar pa mchog gi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / thar pa mchog gi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu dge ba'o //
